#summary How you can contribute to Abot.
#labels Featured

==Specific Contributions==
  * Contributors familiar with mono environment to get/keep Abot running well on mono
  * Contributors to setup a continuous build server (ccnet preferred but not mandatory)
  * Contributors to setup automated performance tests. This would make it easy for use to determine which configuration of Abot work best/worst in several different scenarios
  * Some free dedicated or virtual dedicated hardware for build server, distributed crawl testing, etc..

==General Contributions==
  * Spread the word on blogs/websites and tell others why Abot is great
  * Report bugs or suggest features here http://code.google.com/p/abot/issues
  * Submit bug fixes or features (contact me if your interested)
  * Contribute to [http://code.google.com/p/abot-contrib/ Abot-Contrib]
  * Let us know when you create a cool project that uses Abot so we can promote eachother

==Consider Making A Donation==
A donation of any amount would be greatly appreciated. <br />
